block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Activated LHP Ricardo Rincon from the 60-day disabled list. Optioned LHP Tom Martin to Buffalo of the International League. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Claimed RHP Pat Daneker off waivers from the Chicago White Sox and assigned him to Syracuse of the International League. Recalled RHP Matt Dewitt and placed him on the 60-day disabled list.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Activated LHP Ricardo Rincon from the 60-day disabled list. Optioned LHP Tom Martin to Buffalo of the International League. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Claimed RHP Pat Daneker off waivers from the Chicago White Sox and assigned him to Syracuse of the International League. Recalled RHP Matt Dewitt and placed him on the 60-day disabled list.
National League LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Signed first-round draft pick Ben Diggins and sent him to San Bernardino of the California League.
National Basketball Association NETS--Signed G Kenyon Martin to a multiyear contract.

National Football League NFL--Upheld the one-game suspension of Arizona RB Mario Bates for violating the league's personal conduct policy. JETS--Claimed T Chad Slaughter off waivers from Dallas. CHICAGO BEARS--Signed Brad Culpepper to a two-year contract. CINCINNATI BENGALS--Waived OL Kris Farris and OL Doug Dorley. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Claimed CB Tony Francis off waivers from Philadelphia. Claimed CB Jason Suttle off waivers from Denver. Claimed WR/KR Chris Coleman off waivers from Tennessee. Released CB Terrell Sutton and CB Jeremy Lincoln. HOUSTON--Named Carter Toole director of internet and publications. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Signed CB Otis Smith. Claimed T Josh Rawlings off waivers from Kansas City. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Claimed LB Antony Jordan off waivers from Tampa Bay. Placed DE Greg Jefferson on injured reserve. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Waived CB Ramos McDonald. Claimed S Fred White off waivers from San Diego.

National Hockey League BUFFALO SABRES--Re-signed D James Patrick to a one-year contract. DETROIT RED WINGS--Agreed to terms with F Boyd Devereaux on a three-year contract. PHOENIX COYOTES--Signed C Ryan Lauzon and C Brent Gauvreau to three-year contracts. ST. LOUIS BLUES--Named Don Granato coach of Worcester of the AHL. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Re-signed G Felix Potvin to a one-year contract.
U.S. OLYMPIC COMMITTEE--Named Jeff Howard associate director for media and public relations. U.S.A. HOCKEY--Named Julie Sasner assistant coach for the women's olympic and national teams.

ALBANY N.Y.--Named Scott Marr men's lacrosse coach. ARMY--Announced the resignation of Tod Giles, wrestling coach. MARYLAND--Named Terry Rupp baseball coach. MISSOURI--Named Lane Odom assistant men's basketball coach. Promoted Tony Harvey to associate head coach, men's basketball. PURDUE--Ruled F Adam Wetzel academically ineligible to play basketball during the fall semester.
